AboutSection.Section1: Hello I'm Tait Wayland. I've been doing UI design and development for about 3 years. I'm a product designer at TicketBiscuit. I formerly captained a Code for America brigade,

header.header2: i’m a ui designer and developer living in birmingham, alabama.

ldjson.description: i’m a ui designer and developer living in birmingham, alabama.
ldjson.name: Tait Wayland

sections.title: User Research
sections.description: Start with solid understanding of users and their needs. Wireframe. Prototype. Validate with user tests. Iterate and improve. Rinse and repeat.

sections.title: Mobile Design
sections.description: Design with Sketch. Prototype with Invision. Paying respect to Android and iOS design documentation.

sections.title: Front End Development
sections.description: HTML, CSS, SASS, Javascript, Jquery, AngularJS, ASPNET

sections.title: Process
sections.description: Follow atomic design principles, semantic markup, object-oriented css patterns, and respect style guides. Scalability all-the-way.

sections.title: UX Specialties
sections.description: E-Commerce Design. Marketing Design. Accessibility Design
